member.name: T:MagnaDB.MySQL.InsertIgnoreAttribute
member.summary: A property decorated with this Attribute will be ignored when invoking the Insert() or GroupInsert() methods

member.name: T:MagnaDB.MySQL.UpdateIgnoreAttribute
member.summary: A property decorated with this Attribute will be ignored when invoking an Update() method

member.name: T:MagnaDB.MySQL.DMLIgnoreAttribute
member.summary: A property decorated with this Attribute will be ignored when invoking Insert(), Update(), Delete(), ToIEnumerable(), ToList(), ToDataTable() or Get() methods

member.name: T:MagnaDB.MySQL.DDLIgnoreAttribute
member.summary: A property decorated with this Attribute will be ignored when creating a table using the CreateTable() method

member.name: T:MagnaDB.MySQL.SelectIgnoreAttribute
member.summary: A property decorated with this Attribute will be ignored when invoking ToIEnumerable(), ToList(), ToDataTable() or Get() methods

member.name: T:MagnaDB.MySQL.IdentityAttribute
member.summary: This Attribute is used to specify a property marked as an identity column specification, and therefore will be updated when an Insert() Method succeeds, and can also be used as the search criteria in Get Methods

member.name: T:MagnaDB.MySQL.DataDisplayableAttribute
member.summary: When using the ToDataTable method specifies that by default, only columns with this attribute will be selected.

member.name: T:MagnaDB.MySQL.DateTimeTypeAttribute
member.summary: This Attribute identifies what part of a DateTime object should be used in the database, by default, the complete date and time is used.

member.summary: The kind of the date

member.summary: By using this attribute you can specify the name of the column this property is binded to within the database.

member.name: P:MagnaDB.MySQL.ColumnNameAttribute.Name
member.summary: The name of the column the property is binded to

member.name: M:MagnaDB.MySQL.ColumnNameAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: By using this attribute you can specify the name of the column this property is binded to within the database.

member.name: T:MagnaDB.MySQL.DuplicationColumnAttribute
member.summary: This attribute is used to specify a column belonging to a Duplication Key Dictionary, Properties with the same index will be compared as an only key within the table, by default, properties are marked to Duplication Index 0. Duplication is evaluated using the IsDuplicated() method. A property can be used within different Key combinations

member.name: P:MagnaDB.MySQL.DuplicationColumnAttribute.duplicationIndex
member.summary: The index of the key that the property belongs to

member.name: M:MagnaDB.MySQL.DuplicationColumnAttribute.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Verify a possible duplication using a key combination

member.name: T:MagnaDB.MySQL.ForeignRelationAttribute
member.summary: This class is used to specify Relationships between Models and Inner Properties of ViewModel and TableModel types. Entities will be loaded when specified in parameters when using Select Functions (ToIEnumerable, Get, ToList)

member.name: P:MagnaDB.MySQL.ForeignRelationAttribute.RelationString
member.summary: The string specifying the joining condition of the relationship

member.name: M:MagnaDB.MySQL.ForeignRelationAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a relationship between the outer model class and this model property. {0} is used to refer to the Outer Model Table, {1} is referred to this Property Model Table. Columns belonging to the Outer Model must be enclosed between tags. For a more detailed example watch the SampleRelationship.cs file
member.param: A string specifying the joining condition
